page.title: 15PULBOROUGH POST OFFICE
page.content: Pulborough Post Office provides the following services:banking,savings schemes,pensions & other allowances, licences,stamps,airmail & special letters.Staff include the Postmaster, postmen,counter clerks etc.19 postmen sort,deliver letters & collect mail from local post boxes to be sorted. they wear grey uniform with a red numbered badge for identification. About 500 letters are delivered daily by van,bicycle & on foot.Letters travel 1st or 2nd class & are franked before despatch.Parcels are weighed & stamped;local parcels are charged at a lower rate.Stamp values are in pence & pounds to five pounds.A new set of pictorial stamps are issued every three months.
